# Change Log

## [0.0.7] - 2021-03-20

- Add theme with yellow highlights

## [0.0.6] - 2021-03-20

- Updated the workbench text selection color

- Improved syntax highlighting for Python
- Removed punctuation italics

## [0.0.3] - 2021-03-12

- Updated banner color and logo

## [0.0.1] - 2021-03-12

- Initial release
